page.title: 12A day for Mrs Moore
page.content: Mrs Moore gets up at seven o clock in the morning.She usually sits down for a cup before getting eldest son up for school at eight o'clock.She gets her other two boys up for school.While they are finishing their breakfast,Mrs Moore usually tidies up and gets herself ready for a morning at playschool,because she enjoys looking after young children. She gets home from playschool at about 11:40 and just has time to get the washing in before her children come home for lunch.She always sits down and has her lunch with her children. After lunch Mrs Moore gets herself ready to come to school to help. When she gets back it's time to get the dinner ready for her family after that she sits down for half an hour to read the paper.
